item.title: So vim got slow
item.description: You know that feeling? You press in a key, and you have to wait like 0.5 seconds to see it appear on screen. You try to run vim --clean and everything’s back to “normal”. As you expected, it is caused by a/some plugin(s) and/or you vimrc. Have fun debugging that. You probably know the bulk force: disable every plugin, and enable them once at a time to know which one’s slow.
